.. _`lofreq call`:

LOFREQ CALL
===========

simply call variants





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule lofreq:
        input:
            bam="data/{sample}.bam",
            bai="data/{sample}.bai"
        output:
            "calls/{sample}.vcf"
        log:
            "logs/lofreq_call/{sample}.log"
        params:
            ref="data/genome.fasta",
            extra=""
        threads: 8
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/lofreq/call"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
